    source={
        "query": {
            "match": {
                "message": "Hello {{#name_exists}}{{query_string}}{{/name_exists}}{{^name_exists}}World{{/name_exists}}"
            }
        }
    },
    params={
        "query_string": "Kimchy",
        "name_exists": True
    },
)
